ygData.subject: Re: How to identify Jewelry ? **Possible Spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: Although I haven t run across it, I have heard rumors from various reliable sources that there exists an item called the Mana Stone.  Apparently, this item
ygData.messageBody:
Although I haven't run across it, I have heard rumors from various reliable
sources that there exists an item called the Mana Stone. Apparently, this
item doubles the rate of your Meditation skill. I don't know where to find
it, but once more of us hit the higher lvls and start exploring more, I'm
sure we'll here more about it ;)

Talarin, High Elven Wizard

----- Original Message -----
From: Saleen <saleengt@...>
To: Everquest Wizards <EQ_Wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 5:42 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] How to identify Jewelry ? **Possible Spoiler**


> From: Saleen <saleengt@...>
>
> Hi everyone,
>
> is there anyone out there that knows of any jewelry that speeds up mana
> regen ? I've been told a Jade ring adds 5 to mana and
> speeds up mana regen .. is that true ?
> When i look at the jewelry pieces there is no description as to what they
> do so is there a master list hidden somewhere that
> tells you what benefit each piece of jewelry has ?
>
> Thanks.
>
>

> Saleen : High Elf Wizard - Xegony
